bug.author: kparichay
bug.summary: Build failure with armv7l on CI server
bug.description:
CI server gets build failure with armv7l on the CI server. The log of the build is as given below: <denchmark-code>[ 178s] Executing(%clean): /bin/sh -e /var/tmp/rpm-tmp.OOyIb1 [ 178s] + umask 022 [ 178s] + cd /home/abuild/rpmbuild/BUILD [ 178s] + cd nnstreamer-1.2.0 [ 178s] + /bin/rm -rf /home/abuild/rpmbuild/BUILDROOT/nnstreamer-1.2.0-0.arm [ 178s] + exit 0 [ 178s] ... checking for files with abuild user/group [ 178s] [ 178s] ip-172-31-27-164 finished "build nnstreamer.spec" at Tue Jan 7 02:55:35 UTC 2020. [ 178s] �[32minfo: �[0mfinished building nnstreamer �[32minfo: �[0mupdating local repo �[32minfo: �[0m*** Build Status Summary *** === Total succeeded built packages: (1) === �[32minfo: �[0mgenerated html format report: /var/www/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI/ci/repo-workers/pr-checker/1973-202001071144100.94045901298523-90139be35993868fe318f1291d33fe6818d7ce55/nnstreamer/GBS-ROOT/local/repos/tizen/armv7l/index.html �[32minfo: �[0mgenerated RPM packages can be found from local repo: /var/www/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI/ci/repo-workers/pr-checker/1973-202001071144100.94045901298523-90139be35993868fe318f1291d33fe6818d7ce55/nnstreamer/GBS-ROOT/local/repos/tizen/armv7l/RPMS �[32minfo: �[0mgenerated source RPM packages can be found from local repo: /var/www/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI/ci/repo-workers/pr-checker/1973-202001071144100.94045901298523-90139be35993868fe318f1291d33fe6818d7ce55/nnstreamer/GBS-ROOT/local/repos/tizen/armv7l/SRPMS �[32minfo: �[0mbuild logs can be found in: /var/www/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI/ci/repo-workers/pr-checker/1973-202001071144100.94045901298523-90139be35993868fe318f1291d33fe6818d7ce55/nnstreamer/GBS-ROOT/local/repos/tizen/armv7l/logs �[32minfo: �[0mbuild roots located in: /var/www/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI/ci/repo-workers/pr-checker/1973-202001071144100.94045901298523-90139be35993868fe318f1291d33fe6818d7ce55/nnstreamer/GBS-ROOT/local/BUILD-ROOTS/scratch.armv7l.* </denchmark-code>
Although the log looks like build was successful, however it was failed (the GBS command exited with status 1). This can be confirmed as - upon completion, GBS posts a done log like below: <denchmark-code>info: Done </denchmark-code>
which is missing from the above. Until solved, please use to rebuild the PR. cc. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/leemgs>@leemgs</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/2001>#2001</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
I'm no more seeing such issues; thus I assume it's resolved.
